subject: Suits and Litigation
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The mother of four of the children of the former N.B.A. star Latrell Sprewell sued him for $200 million yesterday, accusing Sprewell of breaking their long-term cohabitation deal and roughing her up last month in their Westchester County home.
snippet: The mother of four of the children of the former N.B.A. star Latrell Sprewell sued him for $200 million yesterday, accusing Sprewell of breaking their long-term cohabitation deal and roughing her up last month in their Westchester County home.
